name: Forest Fire Rescue
description:
Created by Shuhua Li, Rachel Lu, and Bianca Hiew.

You are a park ranger tasked with rescuing animals during a big forest fire! Previous firefights have marked animals found using white particles.

Use WASD and Space to move and rescue any animals you find by pressing the "F" key before time runs out!

Assemble your team or work alone. Good luck Ranger!

Music:

  • Walking Sound: https://orangefreesounds.com/ 
  • Breathing Sound: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ 
  • Helicopter Sound: https://soundbible.com/ 
  • Fire Sound: https://www.soundjay.com/

Asset: Unity Asset Store

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/dream-forest-tree-1052...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/toon-fox-183005
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/white-rabbit-138709
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/birds/living-birds-1...

Multiplayer Engine: Photon 2
